ygData.subject: Re: Patch day is this wednesday!
ygData.msgSnippet: Just for fun I think either snare or one of the darkness line of spells would be best. ... From: Dizzy J.  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Just for fun I think either snare or one of the darkness line of spells
would be best.


----- Original Message -----
From: Dizzy J. <dizzyj@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, January 18, 2000 8:54 AM
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Patch day is this wednesday!


> From: "Dizzy J." <dizzyj@...>
>
> I have no firsthand knowledge either way, but I doubt the fists will proc
> anything.
>
> abashi said that there would be some forthcoming monk weapons that proc,
> and as a hint, work on 1hb. my guess would be that there might be a monk
> only staff or something in the plane of air that might proc something.
> btw the plane of air is supposed to come on line with this patch too (big
> patch)
>
> for fun, what would you want something to proc? personally, I really wish
> I had a good mid lvl set of gloves that proced snare. most usefull spell
> in the game imho. then I could solo in dungeons that most people dont go
> into..upper guk, runnyeye, sola..etc.
>
> On Tue, 18 Jan 2000, Lombard.Mikhael wrote:
>
> > From: "Lombard.Mikhael" <Mikhael_Lombard@...>
> >
> > What will they proc, did they tell you. I am interested in knowing that,
and
> > if it is true then woohoo!
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: imari_dellimore@... [mailto:imari_dellimore@...]
> > Sent: Tuesday, January 18, 2000 8:21 AM
> > To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> > Subject: [EQ-Monks] Patch day is this wednesday!
> >
> >
> > From: imari_dellimore@...
> >
> > I am told that Patch day is this wednesday and with it will come HASTE
for
> > monks
> > aswell as afew other enhancements (some still being kept secret) I am
also
> > told
> > that the treant fists will gain a Proc in this patch. Anyone got any
word
> > on
> > that or was I just being fed a baseless rumor?
> >
> > Personnally I am looking forward to the enhancements and have already
> > started
> > camping for my treant fist items.
> >
